script.name: Cmd.Anarkis.ADS.Carr.Upg.Tune
script.description: Auto prep ships: send consumers to buy tunings

line.text: '%sCargo tuning percent: %s Engine tuning percent: %s Rudder tuning percent: %s'

line.comment: * Ensure at least some ships need upgrades

line.text: '%sBest buy searching for engine tuning reveals following station: %s'

line.comment: * Jump to nearest gate from station
* If max speed of just one customer is lower than carrier speed, fly carrier near target station before releasing ships

line.text: '%sFly order: %s; Following ships are to be sent to buy upgrades:'

line.comment: * Either move to station and release ships or vice versa
* Wait for ships to dock back here
* Send all ships in array to buy tunings at station

sval.val: Auto prep ships: send consumers to buy tunings
%sCargo tuning percent: %s Engine tuning percent: %s Rudder tuning percent: %s
%sBest buy searching for engine tuning reveals following station: %s
%sFly order: %s; Following ships are to be sent to buy upgrades:
Ensure at least some ships need upgrades
Jump to nearest gate from station
If max speed of just one customer is lower than carrier speed, fly carrier near target station before releasing ships
Either move to station and release ships or vice versa
Wait for ships to dock back here
Send all ships in array to buy tunings at station
